name: NVIDIA DGX Spark Pro
description: Professional AI workstation with dual Grace Blackwell chips, 256GB unified memory, and 2TB NVMe storage. Handles large language models and complex training workloads.

reviews.review_text: Training custom models locally is now feasible. Incredible.
Replaced our cloud compute bill. ROI in 6 months.
256GB unified memory handles anything we throw at it.
